posts.author: dahinn
posts.post_text: February 8, 2022 at 8:06 AM#5Hi, collegues. I suppose this macro loaded in the StartUp should do the job:>>> SetUserVar $inequal = "yes">>> SetUserVar $pass = ("Enter the password, please")>>> [$pass == "truselya"]  SetUserVar $inequal = "no">>> [$inequal == "yes"]  NewShow "new" /nc>>> SetUserVar $inequal = "">>> SetUserVar $pass = """truselya" is the correct password.If you want to ask the user one more time you should modify this code a liitle bit.P.S. A long ago I understood the idea is bad. Don't use it :))
